history.content: As long as you drop a class before the designated deadline, you can re-enroll in the class as many times as you want and it won't affect your ability to declare (so technically you can enroll in a class for 8 semesters in a row and drop it before the deadline, and it still won't affect your ability to declare). From what I see, the final drop deadline for Session C is June 30th, like you said. You will not be able to drop the class after that date without a special permission from the Dean. If you drop the class BEFORE the 30th, then yes you can re-enroll in it and it won't affect you in any way.

I'm confused about the Summer Session C calendar. It says if we drop/withdraw from the class by june 30th no refund, if I drop the class before then can I still take Cs70 in the coming fall and declare Cs or will dropping the class now bar me from trying to declare?

Thank you!
history.subject: Can I drop CS70 this summer?
